description: [Star Blizzard](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1033) has established fraudulent profiles on professional networking sites to conduct reconnaissance.(Citation: Microsoft Star Blizzard August 2022)(Citation: CISA Star Blizzard Advisory December 2023)
